name: GNOME Speech2Text
description:
This extension adds speech-to-text (live dictation) to the GNOME Shell using OpenAIâ€™s Whisper model. It requires installing a companion D-Bus service called speech2text-service. The extension captures audio, runs transcription locally (using Whisper) and copies the transcribed text into your clipboard.

This extension accesses the clipboard to copy transcribed text.
author: Kaveh Tehrani
